name: AVCaptionConversionValidator
desc: An object that validates captions for a conversion operation.

items.name: init(captions: [AVCaption], timeRange: CMTimeRange, conversionSettings: [AVCaptionSettingsKey : Any])
items.desc: Creates an object that validates captions for a conversion operation.

items.name: var captions: [AVCaption]
items.desc: The array of captions that the system validates.

items.name: var timeRange: CMTimeRange
items.desc: The time range of the media timeline in which the captions must exist.

items.name: var warnings: [AVCaptionConversionWarning]
items.desc: The collection of warnings the validator encountered.

items.name: class AVCaptionConversionWarning
items.desc: An object that represents a conversion warning produced by a validator.

items.name: var status: AVCaptionConversionValidator.Status
items.desc: A value that indicates the status of validation.

items.name: enum AVCaptionConversionValidator.Status
items.desc: Constants that indicate the status of a validator.
